lines.text: I'm back.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: W-who are you?

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: Don't you remember your deal ol' granny Allie Catt?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: N-no, don't tell me.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: THAT'S RIGHT. I'VE SET ALL MY CATS LOOSE.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: WHY. WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: There'll be absolute chaos in the streets!

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: EXACTLY. The time has come... for my CAT REVOLUTION.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: No! No more cats! Someone's seriously going to get hurt!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: If not the cat, it'll be some kid running to save a cat that's crossing during a red light!

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: Well then... There's only one thing  you can do.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I have to... I have to find all the cats.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I have to FIGHT all the cats.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: That's right, Locke Enloade. You were born for this very moment.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: For these past 6 months, my colleagues and I have made you search for our cats in the highest of trees and darkest of alleyways.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: We have trained you to become the ULTIMATE cat finder. And now, it's time to put your true strength TO THE TEST.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You! You manipulated me!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I never asked for this cat hunting life... I just wanted to be a normal detective, with normal cases.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: Locke, you never were a NORMAL detective. You weren't even a GOOD detective.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You take that back!

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: HAHAHA. Maybe if you find all the cats...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Fine! But I'm not doing this for you...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm doing this FOR THE CATS.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (I'm going to need to stock up on more cat food...)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Let's do this. Initiating WONDER ZONE: FULL DIVE. START!
